posts.title: Hello World using Hexo!
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy or 12$ hexo d -g # hexo deploy --generate$ hexo g -d # hexo generate --deploy More info: Deployment Update12$ hexo clean$ hexo g -d Posting1$ hexo new post <post_name>
